Mateo Kovacic very happy at Chelsea but 'too early' to talk Real Madrid exit

"It’s too early for these questions, I am here and very happy,"

"[Playing regularly] is good, I’m a little bit tired. I was not used to playing every three or four games and here it is very tough football."

"You can’t relax against anybody so it’s a little bit difficult but I really enjoy it. We have a great team, great fans and the city is nice. I like it a lot here.

"I go around and I enjoy the city — it’s huge and I haven’t seen enough of it yet. I’m looking forward to getting to know it more. I’m enjoying it. What’s the most interesting thing I’ve seen so far? The stadium.

"I don’t do anything special. I spend a lot of time in Cobham because I need to prepare myself for training and every game but after that I go home and enjoy time with my wife.

"Nothing special, we go for dinner, we live in the city so we are walking a lot. My family enjoys the city and that’s the most important thing for me in the end."

replies.msg: 甚至假9 雖然好似見到達有進步

車路士中鋒艾華路莫拉達拍攝廣告時貫徹失機王本色，離門3碼竟然射中門柱。

車路士前鋒艾華路莫拉達（Alvaro Morata）似逐漸失去射門觸覺，今季僅取得3個聯賽入球。有趣的是，他即使替西班牙國家隊拍攝廣告時也延續自己糟糕的埋門能力，竟然在門前3碼射中門柱，恐怕要「NG」再來過。

周三英聯盃16強，車路士3:2擊敗打比郡，莫拉達同樣正選披甲上陣，結果依然逃不過失機頻頻的下場，由於另一名中鋒基奧特沒有在後備席，教練沙利沒有把他換出場。幸好對手頭21分鐘就送上兩個烏龍波，最終車仔順利贏3:2，然而莫拉達的入球能力將再次受到抨擊。

《太陽報》斷定若莫拉達繼續擔當進攻主力的話，車路士今季難望捧盃，相信沙利也心中有數，説不定1月會引入一名中鋒。

車路士中鋒艾華路莫拉達拍攝廣告時貫徹失機王本色，離門3碼竟然射中門柱。

車路士前鋒艾華路莫拉達（Alvaro Morata）似逐漸失去射門觸覺，今季僅取得3個聯賽入球。有趣的是，他即使替西班牙國家隊拍攝廣告時也延續自己糟糕的埋門能力，竟然在門前3碼射中門柱，恐怕要「NG」再來過。

周三英聯盃16強，車路士3:2擊敗打比郡，莫拉達同樣正選披甲上陣，結果依然逃不過失機頻頻的下場，由於另一名中鋒基奧特沒有在後備席，教練沙利沒有把他換出場。幸好對手頭21分鐘就送上兩個烏龍波，最終車仔順利贏3:2，然而莫拉達的入球能力將再次受到抨擊。

《太陽報》斷定若莫拉達繼續擔當進攻主力的話，車路士今季難望捧盃，相信沙利也心中有數，説不定1月會引入一名中鋒。

Sarri on Kante and Leicester: "I haven't spoken with him about what happened. I think for him it is not an easy moment, of course, I don't know exactly what because I haven't spoken."

Sarri on Kante's handling of Leicester: "I am not worried [about Kante]. He is able to play in the same when whatever his mental condition, so I am not worried."

Sarri is surprised at his start: "In every experience I have done before. I was in trouble in the first two months. I thought it would be the same here. I think here I was lucky. The players were able to win without a good level of tactical organisation"
Sarri on captaincy for Hazard or Luiz: "Cahill was captain last season. I spoke with his team-mates and everybody told me he was a really good captain."
